item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @Luvodicus Luvodicus
item.description:
@Luvodicus wrote:

add commands UNDERNEATH the last case of " } " for each command

for instance

else if (command.startsWith("empty"))
   {
      removeAllItems();
   }

Add Coding Here…

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("mystats"))
   {
      sendMessage("UserName:  "+playerName);
      sendMessage("Password:  "+playerPass);
      sendMessage("UserID:  "+playerId);
      sendMessage("Rights:  "+playerRights);
      sendMessage("Location X="+absX+" Y="+absY);
         
   }

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @hell_boi hell boi
item.description:
@hell_boi wrote:

ok i want to add a new command but i keep entering wrong

heres my command thing

else if (command.startsWith(“empty”))
{
removeAllItems();
}

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("mystats"))
{
	sendMessage("UserName:  "+playerName);
	sendMessage("Password:  "+playerPass);
	sendMessage("UserID:  "+playerId);
	sendMessage("Rights:  "+playerRights);
	sendMessage("Location X="+absX+" Y="+absY);
		
}

}

{

MyOutput.close();

sendMessage(“Error updating recovery question.”);
